title: New Zac skin, Ice cream Zac
body:
Zac only has one skin at the moment and i think that and ice cream skin would be great.
This skin could change his a large ice-cream (the flavor napoleon, as well as being covered in occasional sprinkles and having a chocolate coated head with a Cherry on top). When his passive is activated he would become blobs of all the different flavors of napoleon ice cream and then his  head (chocolate coating with a cherry on it). He could have a unique quote if Leona uses her ult on him "try it, i don't melt" and similar ones for brand. 
i just thought this would be a cool skin, feedback is appreciated.

replies.body: Love the idea, he needs a new skin

This may or may not turn me off ice cream forever.
Thanks man.

Nah, who could get turned off of ice-cream :D
I always though that he should look less creepy and more cute xD

Who's the guy in american ads which goes "OH YEAH".

Oh wait, Kool Aid right?

So Kool Aid Zac.

I wanna see that.{{champion:154}}
Pretty sure this has been said 100 times already on the forums section but the board ruined it :l

I definitely agree on the basis that Zac needs a new skin, and I haven't seen or heard of a better concept than this one
Ice cream {{champion:154}}
I think that idea should stay in the freezer...
